patthana18.18:1.1_0: Āsavañceva sāsavañca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.18:2.1_0: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.18:3.1_0: Āsavañceva sāsavaṁ hetuñca sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.18:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana18.18:4.1_0: Āsavañceva sāsavañca nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanāsavo ceva nanoāsavo ca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
